projects.name: IncomingOrderProcessor
modernization_steps: Replace System.Messaging with Azure Service Bus client library
Replace Main/ServiceBase.Run with Generic Host builder
Update configuration system to use IConfiguration
Remove ProjectInstaller and related Windows Service artifacts
blockers: MSMQ is Windows-only and not available in Linux containers
System.Messaging namespace not available in .NET Core/.NET 5+

summary: Legacy .NET Framework 4.8.1 Windows Service that processes orders from MSMQ. Requires significant modernization for .NET 10 and Azure Container Apps deployment.
prerequisites: Decision on message queue replacement (Azure Service Bus recommended)
Azure Service Bus namespace provisioned (if chosen)
Container registry access for image storage
recommendations: Use Azure Service Bus to replace MSMQ for cloud-native messaging
Implement Worker Service pattern with BackgroundService
Add health checks for container orchestration
Use structured logging (ILogger) instead of Console.WriteLine
Consider using managed identity for Azure resource authentication
Implement retry policies for message processing failures
